normal.question_text: Find the union of two sets of numbers.
normal.correct_code:
def find_union(set_a, set_b):
    return set_a | set_b
normal.explanation: This function should return the union of two sets, which combines all unique elements from both sets. Using the union operator or method achieves this correctly.

buggy.buggy_question_text: The function returns an empty set instead of the union of the two sets.
